---
pagetitle: "Sampling Proportions Right Tail Area Question"
params:
  count: 190 
  n: 250 
  p: 0.79
---

```{r}
p<-params$p
count<-params$count
n<-params$n
```

Suppose we have a population proportion of $`r 100*p`\%$ and take a sample of size $`r n`$. Suppose the sample proportion from that sample is $`r count`$ out of $`r n`$. What is the chance of getting that sample proportion or more?
